hero.developer_intro: I design and build web tools that feel simple — but solve tough challenges behind the scenes.

about.title: My Story
about.story: Web developer from the Netherlands <1>building websites since the early 2000s</1>, starting with MS FrontPage back in the day and continually advancing as technology evolved.
about.uvp: What drives me is creating tools that <1>feel simple</1> on the surface but <1>solve real challenges</1> underneath.
about.skills: I love working with <1>React</1> and <1>Django</1> to turn ideas into dynamic, reliable web apps, and I am always curious to explore new tools to <1>deliver better results</1>.
about.hobbies: Outside of work, I enjoy strolling in <1>Efteling</1>, a Dutch park with a unique enchanting charm. I also like to play Nintendo games and learn (human) languages.

skills.title: Tools I Rock With
skills.description: I have honed my expertise in the technologies listed below. I am also always excited to explore and master new tools and frameworks that can help me deliver even better solutions.

contact.title: Let's Connect
contact.text: Together, we can bring your business goals to life.

share.title: Know someone who I can help?
